column5: Sleeps up to 40,2 living rooms with 2 open concept gorgeous kitchens and 2 dining rooms that has wrap around 22 windows.6 large and beautifully designed bed rooms with custom built in XL bunk beds.Nautical designs to give the feeling of the ocean and the sea while you have the most comfortable night sleep.The kitchens are open with custom cabinets that have glass doors to let you see what inside.4 Bathrooms with vessel sinks and custom built showers that have large refreshing shower heads
